WRITING.TEXT: Move Wan #8217;er to top right and Li Bai is a heavy damage dealer but he #8217;s fragile so put him between Pan an and Zifu, Pan an bottom left. Song you works well with Pan an but you should be fine with Zifu for now

First, I #8217;m so sorry that you had to endure that and you #8217;re still trying to piece together everything that happened. Second of all, you are NOT wrong. You got taken advantage of and your extended family isn #8217;t taking the responsibility for their actions. You have every right to be angry and to separate from any toxic or narcissistic behavior. The manipulative behavior your family is showing is making you feel like the perpetrator when you #8217;re really the victim. You didn #8217;t do a single thing that was wrong and the pettiness as far as social media posts or talking behind your back is a sign for you to move on. Can you trust your family? I personally wouldn #8217;t be able too after that. Your grandmother is extremely selfish to play on your situation to her benefit. I would be interested to know about what ELSE may be hidden about me or details that have been kept secret. It #8217;s not your fault. I #8217;m so sorry you had to go through that and still are navigating through that.

Don #8217;t thank me!! You need to hear that you aren #8217;t wrong. I been through a nasty family situation. The best thing to do for your own sanity is to separate. You #8217;re going to be amazing, don #8217;t give up queen!!
Xuanji, Li Bai, Lord Yi
^^that would be a perfect set up

WRITING.TITLE: New Taiping summoning???
WRITING.TEXT: I logged in today and saw you can summon Taiping for only 100 ingots. Should I go for it or is Taiping not a good red hero? I #8217;m just interested as to why she #8217;s so cheap. Is she a crowd control like Pan An or Wu Zetian?
Oh okay thank you. Is she good?
Oh ok, I don #8217;t really see people using her. I always check the cross ranking higher ups and I never see her in the embattle. Thank you guys!!

Yeah in the long run, Li Bai only gets better and better. Always check the cross rank higher ups to see what heroes they have, usually if they don #8217;t have the super fabled (diaochan, Fucha, Zhuge Laing etc. ) they will always have Li Bai, Wan #8217;er and Xuanji. I occasionally see Song Yu but Li Bai is more ideal, he #8217;s also a finisher. If you set your gems up right, Pan an will go first, you or Wan #8217;er will go second and from there Xuanji will hit and Li Bai will finish.

I #8217;m sorry to tell you but eventually you #8217;ll probably need to get rid of Prince Gao, Shizhen and Mulan. Those heroes don #8217;t fare too well in the late game. For now I feel like you don #8217;t need Gao and Mulan they #8217;re both tanks. I have a scholar set up so I #8217;m not much help with this except you #8217;d do better if you farmed other heroes.

I would suggest if you have Lord Yi, Li Bai and Wan #8217;er. It really all depends on what set up you want, if you desire to have a healer. Pan an and Wan #8217;er are usually staples; you don #8217;t necessarily need Pan an but he can survive and he gets better long term rather than just being good now. Xuanji is also amazing, she #8217;s easier to farm now. If you have the funds, all the older or rarer fables are good except Dongpo, and possible Taiping since no one really uses her.

Mulan becomes useless down the line. You don #8217;t want to keep building into a hero that isn #8217;t half as good as another hero. Li Bai is an excellent choice and works well with Xuanji. I think that would create the #8220;meta formation #8221; or the ideal formation to have all the way till late game.

WRITING.TEXT: Is this a new hero? I want to invest in her but this is the first time I #8217;ve seen a hero with a bow before.
Ohhh okay thank you!!

I #8217;m pretty late to this but honestly why bet on someone #8217;s potential? Why wait for a half a person when you could have a whole one? I honestly feel like you may need to boost your self confidence in yourself. Therapy is a great suggestion.

First, you definitely have to swap out Gao and Shizhen. Just horrible. If you #8217;re willing to devote a lot of money try to eventually move up to Jing, Fuchs etc. However for the best formation: Xuanji, and either Lord Yi or Li bai
Honestly, they got Muse AND Paramore?? It #8217;s definitely one of the best soundtracks for any movie series I #8217;ve ever come across. I listen to the ost every day.

WRITING.TITLE: What were the last words you #8217;ve exchanged with someone before they died?

WRITING.TEXT: I don #8217;t know if you #8217;ll see this but ummm your boyfriend is VERY petty. I #8217;ve been in an abusive relationship and when I finally moved on I ended up being with someone who was equally abusive just emotionally. It sometimes becomes a cycle whether we realize it or not. I went from being physically beat up to being emotionally drained. The liking exes trip is really a red flag especially when you express that you #8217;re upset about this. No friend would EVER want your sloppy, disgusting, weak, just straight up poopie seconds. You have every right to feel angry or whatever other emotions combined.

WRITING.TITLE: Adults of Reddit, what #8217;s a song you sang as a kid that you realize now is extremely inappropriate?
We seriously need to stop acting like one person is totally responsible for the breakup.
WRITING.TEXT: Honestly, the whole #8220; don #8217;t worry you #8217;re gonna find someone better #8221; is good for toxic people. When I reflect on my past relationships, I realize that I did some stupid and I mean STUPID things. Granted, one person really can sink the relationship down to just no lagoon. Now if the person cheated or was abusive that #8217;s in no way, shape or form the other persons fault. BUT we tend to lie to our friends instead of giving them constructive criticism. If your friend or even if you think that you contributed to the breakup it #8217;s better to own up to it than continue on a cycle of #8220;it #8217;s everyone #8217;s fault but mine #8221;.
Yeah I #8217;ve had that happen to me! I used to blame myself so hard for being abused but once you get away you realize how much you change out of fear.

OMG YEA! My ex constantly lived by this motto to the point where if anything negative happened I couldn #8217;t be sad around it with him. Honestly, the bad points really are necessary for us to grow and we appreciate them because they show us the good. It #8217;s not going to be good every second so let #8217;s not lie to ourselves #128580;

WRITING.TITLE: To the people of Reddit who #8217;ve had a Brazilian wax before, can you honestly say it #8217;s worth the pain, money and slight embarrassment?
What is something you #8217;ve learned these past few months about life that you would #8217;ve never experienced if it wasn #8217;t for the pandemic?
If you #8217;re an adult virgin or saving yourself for marriage, there #8217;s NOTHING wrong with you.
WRITING.TEXT: I #8217;m about to turn 21 and I #8217;m the only one in my friend group who #8217;s still a virgin. My mom always taught me about having free will over my body. Due to me always being super aware of who made me comfortable I just never felt at ease enough to cross that boundary with any of my past relationships. It #8217;s honestly weird when people are grossed out by the fact that I #8217;m not interested in casual sex. I have a guy friend who #8217;s celibate but his friend group bullied him, called him (gay slurs) until he caved in to the peer pressure. He wasn #8217;t the same after that and I can tell he feels bad about breaking that promise to himself. There #8217;s nothing wrong with sex it #8217;s your choice. I just don #8217;t understand why being a virgin especially as an adult or waiting is #8220;weird #8221;. Edit:: Thank you for the rewards I can die in peace. One thing..I can see some people assumed I was a guy and said comments along the lines of #8220;you can #8217;t get laid #8221;. It #8217;s honestly sad that people who feel like this are apart of the problem. You can #8217;t preach that sex is a choice but shun people who choose not to have it. I #8217;m a woman but I can only imagine how much pressure men must go through to have sex to uphold their masculinity. I #8217;m really grateful for all the positive comments!! Edit 2: I hate that I have to edit this again but woah I did not expect all the feedback. I #8217;m trying to respond to every comment. I notice the people saying, #8220;this isn #8217;t an unpopular opinion #8221; probably aren #8217;t virgins. Having sex is GREAT, and not having it is great as well. The comments judging people or even me about what I do with my body is the PERFECT example of why my opinion is so unpopular. You #8217;re free to have your opinion but by the comments you see there are so many people who have been nervous to open up about this topic. Be respectful.

When? He actually was sexually active but converted to Christianity. He decided to be celibate but it was actually his church friends (Crazy right?) who convinced him and made fun of him until he eventually broke down. He #8217;s trying to get back but he #8217;s still hanging around the same people so hey idk.
I #8217;m a woman...it #8217;s like you just said, #8220;if you choose to have free will over your body you #8217;re disgusting #8221;

I #8217;ve explored my sexuality but because being a virgin isn #8217;t the norm it #8217;s become apart of who I am. Whoever I choose to have my first time with I just want to look back and feel good that I waited all this time for a good reason.
Oh? I was confused honestly. Tbh incels scare me

For me personally, which I didn #8217;t want to put in my original post is I #8217;ve been sexually harassed/people have taken advantage of my boundaries. So for me my main issue is first being comfortable enough to even want to have sex with someone. I #8217;m happy that you have that experience and you #8217;ve gotten over that awkwardness. It #8217;s just funny when people assume virgins are against sex but usually whenever I rarely meet someone who is a virgin..they #8217;re just waiting haha. I would hope to grow sexually with someone or if things don #8217;t work out, atleast I was happy with sharing myself with them.
Thank you. I take pride in my love of anime and books.
I think it #8217;s the area I #8217;m in as well. On my college campus alone if you #8217;re not having sex, there #8217;s something seriously wrong with your brain supposedly.

Yes, but it #8217;s not that easy for everyone. Most of my friends told me they weren #8217;t ready to have sex at the time but they just felt like they #8220;had #8221; too. It #8217;s funny whenever the subject comes up and I say I #8217;m a virgin the first response is always a laugh and #8220;girl no you #8217;re not #8221;. Then there #8217;s awkward silence..it #8217;s so funny now
You #8217;re apart of the problem lmao

Yeah i remember there was this show/ movie called the 40 year old virgin and I still don #8217;t get it. Also, Jane the virgin another show I have no interest in watching but it shows how much emphasis is put on our sex lives.
I #8217;m actually not. This post is mainly for other people not me.

I #8217;m so sorry. I #8217;m happy you have someone you #8217;re comfortable with. I was pretty close to being raped at 16 by my boyfriend and it changed a lot of things for me. I hope to learn and feel comfortable with someone but more than anything I #8217;m happy with who I am. ;)
Yes I can speak from experience hehe

I really loved this comment! It #8217;s so funny when the topic comes up. I think people don #8217;t realize how much sex comes up into our conversations or how we perceive others. People say they don #8217;t think this an unpopular opinion but in these comments alone they #8217;re assuming that if you #8217;re a virgin it #8217;s because you can #8217;t find someone. It #8217;s kind of sad, people think what you do with your body is a joke. I was really hesitant to talk about the positivity thing!! As a woman I see a LOT of sexual posts from feminism pages but there #8217;s not a lot of openness about virginity it seems. On the other hand there #8217;s still this #8220;ew #8221; factor when a person has a lot of partners. It literally makes no sense, you #8217;re gross for not having sex but if you have too much sex you #8217;re just as nasty...

I can #8217;t say whether I agree or not because of lack of experience. However, I have a lot of bad experiences. This!! My virginity isn #8217;t a transaction it #8217;s just a form of consent. I think society puts way too much emphasis on our sex lives.
